https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gHmFTGUMM6I1vuUV9Zpr5yc2Gg1.jpg A television actor drinks too much and gets blackballed from the industry, and then he decides to break back in by directing his own movie. Eventually, he gets sober, and then falls off the wagon and goes crazy and turns his film into a musical. Danny Roane: First Time Director
